page.title: 18POP STARS IN KILMARNOCK
page.content: These are two of our favourite Pop Groups. {WHAM-}The members of this group are George Michael and Andrew Ridgely. They have reached number one in the pop charts a few times. They went on tour to China and George had to shave his beard off. They have won medals for their songs and videos. They have become famous all over the world. Two of their most famous songs are Club Tropicana and Freedom. {STATUS QUO-}There are five in the group. They are Francis Rossi, Rick Parfitt, Alan Lancaster, Andy Bown and Peter Kircher. Their last live concert was "End of the road 84", which was at Milton Keynes. They have been going for 23 years now at the top. Two of their most famous songs are Caroline and Rocking All Over The World.
